testcase.name: I want to enter Employee ID.
testcase.system-out: Given I have already logged in OrangeHrm and opened Add Employee Section....passed When I have entered Full Name and Employee ID...............................passed And I clicked on Save Button................................................passed Then New Employee should get added..........................................passed

testcase.name: I want to check the Login Details Checkbox
testcase.system-out: Given Already logging in Orange Hrm and inside Add Employee Section.........passed When I enter Full Name, Employee ID, Add Photograph, Click on Login Details.passed And Clicking on Save Button.................................................passed Then New Employee should be adding here.....................................passed

testcase.name: I want to add First Name, Middle Name, Last Name
testcase.system-out: Given Already logged in OrangeHrm and opened Add Employee Section...........passed When I enter First Name, Middle Name, Last Name.............................passed And I click on Save Button..................................................passed Then New Employee should be added...........................................passed

testcase.name: I want to add the password for the new employee
testcase.system-out: Given I am already logged in Orange Hrm and inside Add Employee Section.....passed When I enter Full Name, Employee ID, Add Photograph, Click on Login Details.passed And Enter Username, Password and Confirm Password...........................passed And I am Clicking on Save Button............................................passed Then New Employee should get add here.......................................passed

testcase.name: I want to add Photograph
testcase.system-out: Given Already log in Orange Hrm and inside Add Employee Section.............passed When I enter Full Name, Employee ID, Add Photograph.........................passed And I Clicking on Save Button...............................................passed Then New Employee should add here...........................................passed

testcase.name: I want to add the status for the new employee
testcase.system-out: Given Already logged into Orange Hrm and inside Add Employee Section........passed When I entered Full Name, Employee ID, Add Photograph, Click on Login Details.passed And Enter Username, Password, Confirm Password and select status as Enabled.passed And Click on Save Button....................................................passed Then New Employee should add................................................passed

testcase.name: I want to add the username for the new employee
testcase.system-out: Given Logged in Orange Hrm and inside Add Employee Section..................passed When I enter Full Name, Employee ID, Add Photograph, Click on Login Details.passed And Enter the Username......................................................passed And Click Save Button.......................................................passed Then New Employee should be added here......................................passed
